function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Digital inequality in cities","Impact":"Limited access to digital solutions for certain populations, exacerbating social and economic disparities","Mitigation":"Investment in digital infrastructure, policies to address digital divide, and awareness programs","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure, telecommunication technologies, policies","People":"Populations with limited access to technology","Owner":"Government, technology companies, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Challenges in 5G deployment","Impact":"Slow implementation, limited access to advanced connectivity, geopolitical conflicts, and ethical concerns","Mitigation":"Governmental support, infrastructure development, policy frameworks, and ethical guidelines","Technologies":"5G technology, infrastructure development, policy frameworks","People":"Urban populations, telecommunications industry, policymakers","Owner":"Government, telecommunications industry, international organizations"},{"Description":"Risks associated with 6G wireless technology","Impact":"Potential challenges in implementation, access, and ethical concerns","Mitigation":"Early planning, ethical guidelines, policy frameworks, and infrastructure development","Technologies":"6G wireless technology, ethical guidelines, policy frameworks","People":"Future urban populations, technology industry, policymakers","Owner":"Technology companies, policymakers, international organizations"}]}
